The resort can be reached by a funicular train from

SNCF station, taking approximately 7 minutes. The funicular station and ticket office are at the far end of the platforms, away from the main station building and bus station. However on major transfer days there is a free shuttle bus from the station entrance to the funicular.

Alternatively there are local buses from Bourg St Maurice and the major transport hubs in the area (

Throughout the day during the main winter and summer seasons the major villages (notably Arc 2000, Arc 1950, Arc 1600 and Arc 1800) are linked by free shuttle buses.

The funicular from Bourg St Maurice arrives into Arc 1600.
